alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 9:13PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Montgomery County through 1000 PM CDT... At 912 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tyro, or 7 miles northeast of Caney, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. Torrential downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coffeyville, Independence, Caney, Dearing, Tyro, Bolton, Elk City Lake, Independence Airport and Elk City State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
